issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: SQL
components.description: Issues related to Hive Query Language and its conformance with ANSI SQL.

fields.description:
This query is supposed to return 3 rows and will when run without Tez but returns 2 rows when run with Tez.

select tjoin1.rnum, tjoin1.c1, tjoin1.c2, tjoin2.c2 as c2j2 from tjoin1 left outer join tjoin2 on ( tjoin1.c1 = tjoin2.c1 and tjoin1.c2 > 15 )

tjoin1.rnum	tjoin1.c1	tjoin1.c2	c2j2
1	20	25	<null>
2	<null>	50	<null>

instead of

tjoin1.rnum	tjoin1.c1	tjoin1.c2	c2j2
0	10	15	<null>
1	20	25	<null>
2	<null>	50	<null>

create table  if not exists TJOIN1 (RNUM int , C1 int, C2 int)
 STORED AS orc ;

0|10|15
1|20|25
2|\N|50

create table  if not exists TJOIN2 (RNUM int , C1 int, C2 char(2))
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|' LINES TERMINATED BY '\n' 
 STORED AS TEXTFILE ;

0|10|BB
1|15|DD
2|\N|EE
3|10|FF
fields.summary: Incorrect result set for vectorized left outer join

comments.body: Confirmed. Though the problem only happens when tjoin1 is ORC and not text. @prasanth_j any ideas?
[~prasanth_j] ^^ Right syntax this time

This issue happens only when vectorization is enabled. Without vectorization (but with ORC) the query runs correct. [~mmccline] VectorMapJoin operator always applies the filter on big table side without checking for type of join. Can you check if thats the issue?
There are 3 fields in MapJoinDesc I need to understand: filters, valueTableDescs, valueFilteredTableDesc and their usage in (regular) inner join and outer join.
The patch simply turns off vectorization for OUTER JOIN.  Looking into an actual fix.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12701442 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
[~vikram.dixit] ready to commit?

Hi, This JIRA has been requested for inclusion in branch-1.2 and has not seen activity for some time after marking as being ready-ish to commit. [~vikram.dixit]/[~mmccline], what is the state of this jira?

[~mmccline] Is the patch uploaded today an updated version of the earlier +1'd patch? I think this one slipped through the cracks. Also, is it relevant with all the new vectorized map join code that went in recently?

Thanks
Vikram.

This patch was intended to go in February and fell between the cracks because it went into another branch.

[~vikram.dixit] it is relevant because although the new native vector map join is on by default, it can be turned off and there are cases like N-way where we haven't gone native yet.

Since Hybrid Grace was added, the change got a little more complicated (I added a common base class).

[~sushanth] Yes, it needs to go into 1.2.
(I got it back up to speed and ready this weekend)
Thanks for the update, Matt! Will await Vikram & tests, then. :)

ATTACHMENT ID: 12730138 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
The patch looks good to me. Although, we could do with at least one SMB join test. From looking at the tests, I could not find any that triggers the Vector SMB code path.

[~vikram.dixit] thank you for noticing SMB not showing up in the vector_left_outer_join3.q output.

I fixed that Q file so that MR now shows "Sorted Merge Bucket Map Join Operator" in the explain output.
However, I notice the Tez output does not.  But also vectorized_bucketmapjoin1.q uses a Merge Join.

And, vector_left_outer_join3.q doesn't show the same problem as non-bucketed...  So, I am wondering if there is a problem on the SMB side.  I thought there was...

[~mmccline] I checked the output of the test and it looks like queries have hints added to them and the explain outputs have gone missing? In tez, the equivalent for the Sort Merge Bucket Map Join Operator would be the Merge Join Operator in the MapOperator. Can you remove hints and enable auto conversion to smb join so that I can verify the plans. Take a look at tez_smb_1.q for e.g.

[~vikram.dixit] I removed the annotations and the MR vector_left_outer_join3.q.out and fiddled with environment variables so that it now has "Sorted Merge Bucket Map Join Operator" operators; Tez has "Merge Join Operator" as you said.

The original LEFT OUTER JOIN problem does not repro with vector_left_outer_join3.q though.
That seems to be because with SMB there seems to be full delegation to the base class. I am not sure if we need the SMB changes at all.
Given lack of time, I think I'll pull the SMB changes since the regular map join case repro is very clear.
[~vikram.dixit] Ok, SMB removed.  I think this one is good to go as soon as the Apache tests pass.
